mapper.select: select * from member where mem_email=#{mem_email} and mem_pw=#{mem_pw}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_email, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_gender, mem_phone, mem_addr, mem_grade) values(#{mem_email}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_gender}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_addr}, '4')
mapper.update: update member set mem_phone=#{mem_phone}, mem_addr=#{mem_addr}, mem_grade=#{mem_grade}, mem_logdate=#{mem_logdate}, club_no=#{club_no} where mem_no=#{mem_no}
